com.soctec.soctec.utils

Class FileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soctec.soctec.utils.FileHandler

  • public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    FileHandler handles all reading and writing of files including Resources
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Joakim Schmidt, David Johnsson
